description:
PES 2011 3D boosts your
experience of the Beautiful Game not
just to a new level, but into a
completely new dimension! Revel in
PES 2011 3D’s big game
atmosphere, its stunning 3D visuals
and perfect gameplay. Enjoy the many
Game Modes it offers, including the
absorbing Master League mode and
the world’s most prestigious club
football tournament: the UEFA
Champions League.
name: PES 2011 3D
